text: The Bitter Tea of General Yen is a 1933 American romantic drama movie directed by Frank Capra and was based on the 1930 novel of the same name by Grace Zaring Stone. It stars Barbara Stanwyck, Nils Asther, Walter Connolly, Richard Loo, Gavin Gordon, Toshia Mori, Lucien Littlefield and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1933 romantic drama movies Category:1933 war movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Capra Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies about interracial romance
title: The Bitter Tea of General Yen
